projects.name: Movix
projects.description: Developed a sleek front-end application that seamlessly integrates with a comprehensive movie database API, utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Redux. This project enhanced my ability to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces, demonstrating my proficiency in modern web development technologies.

projects.name: Medicinal Plant Identification
projects.description: Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based system for accurate and efficient plant species recognition. This project demonstrated my expertise in deep learning and image processing, enhancing my ability to create advanced AI applications.

projects.name: Music Player
projects.description: Developed a music player using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling users to listen to songs and create custom playlists. This project showcased my ability to build interactive web applications with seamless audio integration.

projects.name: Food Delivery Website
projects.description: Developed a front-end application using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, featuring multiple web pages like View Cart, Search for Food and Restaurants, Payment Options, and Order Food.

experiences.description: As part of my internship, I actively contributed to the development and implementation of Mental Health Tracker project, leveraging machine learning algorithm to analyze and monitor Mental health indicators, facilitating early intervention and support for individuals facing mental health challenges.

During this internship, I developed a responsive portfolio website, an interactive temperature converter, and an engaging landing page using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. These projects sharpened my skills in front-end development and user experience design.
In this I gained practical experience in Artificial intelligence and machine learning and also complete one course AWS Machine Learning Foundations, enhancing my knowledge and skills in this domain.
